Repeated Permutation Interaction Test on Stratified Subsets

Source: R/repeated_perm_diff_interaction.R
repeated_perm_diff_interaction.Rd

Performs multiple stratified subsamples of the overrepresented group, runs `perm_diff_interaction()` on each, and aggregates the results.

Usage

repeated_perm_diff_interaction(
  X,
  Y,
  MX,
  MY,
  stratify_cols,
  g_col,
  a_col,
  features = NULL,
  n_iter = 50,
  B = 100,
  seed = 42
)

Arguments

X

Expression matrix (samples × genes) for the overrepresented ancestry.

Y

Expression matrix for the underrepresented ancestry.

MX

Metadata for X.

MY

Metadata for Y.

stratify_cols

Character vector of metadata column names to stratify by.

g_col

Name of the grouping variable (e.g., "condition").

a_col

Name of the ancestry variable.

features

Optional vector of feature names to include (default: all).

n_iter

Number of stratified subsample iterations.

B

Number of permutations in each `perm_diff_interaction()` call.

seed

Base random seed for reproducibility.

Value

A list with:

aggregated

Data frame with per-feature summary across iterations.

all_iterations

Combined data frame of all summary_stats results.

metadata

Info about run parameters.
